tooltips.export_chat: Export current chat to text file
tooltips.close_chat: Close current chat and create a new one

settings.title: AI Model Settings
settings.ollama_server_description: Ollama server address. Leave empty for auto-detection.
settings.model_description: Model to be used for new chats. Existing chats keep their model.
settings.notify_status_changes_description: When you change your status (Online, Away, Busy, Invisible), the AI will be automatically notified in the active chat.
settings.language_description: Language in which menus, buttons and system messages will be displayed.

export_import.export_description: Select a previously exported JSON chat file.
export_import.export_description_full: Export all your chats in JSON format for backup or migration.
export_import.export_selected_info: Mark chats in the list using the avatar icon.
export_import.import_description: Select a previously exported JSON chat file.

import_conflict.title: Duplicate Chat Detected
import_conflict.warning: WARNING: The chat to import has FEWER messages. Replacing would cause data loss.
import_conflict.warning_blocked: CANNOT REPLACE: Data would be lost.
import_conflict.question: What would you like to do?
import_conflict.option_merge_desc: Combine both chats keeping all messages
import_conflict.option_replace_desc: Replace existing chat with imported one
import_conflict.auto_skipped: This chat will be skipped automatically.

delete_chat.title: Delete chat
delete_chat.message: Are you sure you want to delete this chat? This action cannot be undone.

info.title: About MSN-AI
info.description: AI chat system inspired by Windows Live Messenger.
info.contact_message_1: This is a personal open source project. Please be patient if the response is not immediate.
info.contact_message_2: Before contacting, make sure you have reviewed the documentation and source code in the GitHub repository.

chat.welcome_message: Select a chat from the list or create a new one to begin.
chat.no_chats: No chats. Create a new one.
chat.no_models: No models installed. Install models in Ollama.

messages.status_changed: I have changed my status to {status}. {message}
messages.status_away: I'm away but you can leave me a message.
messages.status_busy: I'm busy but I'll respond when I can.
messages.status_invisible: I prefer not to be seen at this time.

errors.invalid_json: Invalid JSON file or no chats.
errors.invalid_file: Error reading file. Verify it's a valid JSON.
errors.select_file_first: Please select a JSON file first
errors.select_valid_json: Please select a valid JSON file
errors.voice_not_supported: Your browser doesn't support voice recognition.
errors.close_chat_confirm: Close this chat and create a new one?
